RESEND#2
I still have not heard back and they are still at it referencing warez material
including my illegally obtained databases, now the 12/23 version here
http://www.binnews.info/_bin/liste.php?country=fr&cat_id=32&page=1&pageb
y=50&ng_id=abwppcgps . I would appreciate a reply and hopefully you will put an end
to this as this obviously totally against your rule. 
Thanks,
Guillaume Perrotin
www.GpsPasSion.com  
 
-----------------------
Hi,
I have not heard back and they are still at it referencing warez material including
my illegally obtained databases here
http://www.binnews.info/_bin/liste.php?country=fr&cat_id=32&page=1&pageb
y=50&ng_id=abwppcgps. I would appreciate a reply and hopefully you will put an end
to this as this obviously is totally against your rules, heck you guys warned me the
other day because I was wrongly suspected of sending out spam! 
Thanks,
Guillaume Perrotin
